Style/RedundantFetchBlock.description:
Description

Use `fetch(key, value)` instead of `fetch(key) { value }` when value has Numeric, Rational, Complex, Symbol or String type, `false`, `true`, `nil` or is a constant.
Style/RedundantFetchBlock.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

References: ['https://github.com/fastruby/fast-ruby#hashfetch-with-argument-vs-hashfetch--block-code'] (type: list)
SafeForConstants: False (type: bool)
